languages.text: {n}Друкари делает жест одной из теней подле вас — вам насильно запрокидывают голову. Маражай подносит ладонь со странным предметом: вы успеваете разглядеть полупрозрачную лоснящуюся кожу, перекатывающиеся под ней сизые пульсирующие органы и маленькую головку с зазубренными жвалами, прежде чем друкари прижимает личинку к вашему лицу.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari gestures to one of the shadows near you and your head is forced backward. Marazhai brings the hand holding the strange object closer: you manage to make out translucent, glossy skin, bluish, pulsating organs beneath, and a little head with serrated jaws, before the Drukhari pushes the larva into your face.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари делает жест одной из теней подле вас — вам насильно запрокидывают голову. Маражай подносит ладонь со странным предметом: вы успеваете разглядеть полупрозрачную лоснящуюся кожу, перекатывающиеся под ней сизые пульсирующие органы и маленькую головку с зазубренными жвалами, прежде чем друкари прижимает личинку к вашему лицу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari gestures to one of the shadows near you, and it forcibly tilts back your head. Marazhai brings the hand with the strange object closer: you manage to make out the translucent, glossy skin, the bluish, pulsating organs underneath, and the little head with the serrated jaws before he pushes the larva into your face.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari gestures to one of the shadows near you, and it forcibly tilts back your head. Marazhai brings the hand with the strange object closer: you manage to make out the translucent, glossy skin, the bluish, pulsating organs underneath, and the little head with the serrated jaws before he pushes the larva into your face.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari gestures to one of the shadows near you and it forcibly tilts back your head. Marazhai brings the hand with the strange object closer: you manage to make out the translucent, glossy skin, the bluish, pulsating organs underneath, and the little head with the serrated jaws before the Drukhari pushes the larva into your face.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari gestures to one of the shadows near you and it forcibly tilts back your head. Marazhai brings the hand with the strange object closer: you manage to make out the translucent, glossy skin, the bluish, pulsating organs underneath, and the little head with the serrated jaws before the Drukhari pushes the larva into your face.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari gestures to one of the shadows near you and your head is forced backward. Marazhai brings the hand holding the strange object closer: you manage to make out translucent, glossy skin, bluish, pulsating organs beneath, and a little head with serrated jaws, before the Drukhari pushes the larva into your face.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari gestures to one of the shadows near you and your head is forced backward. Marazhai brings the hand holding the strange object closer: you manage to make out translucent, glossy skin, bluish, pulsating organs beneath, and a little head with serrated jaws, before the Drukhari pushes the larva into your face.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari s'adresse d'un geste à l'une des ombres à proximité et votre tête est subitement projetée en arrière. Marazhai approche l'étrange objet qu'il tenait en main. Vous parvenez à distinguer une peau translucide et brillante, des organes bleutés et palpitants et une petite tête à la gueule dentelée avant que le Drukhari ne dépose la larve sur votre visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari gestures to one of the shadows near you and your head is forced backward. Marazhai brings the hand holding the strange object closer: you manage to make out translucent, glossy skin, bluish, pulsating organs beneath, and a little head with serrated jaws, before the Drukhari pushes the larva into your face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari s'adresse d'un geste à l'une des ombres à proximité et celle-ci vous force la tête en arrière. Marazhai approche l'étrange objet qu'il tenait en main. Vous parvenez à distinguer une peau translucide et brillante, des organes bleutés et palpitants et une petite tête à la gueule dentelée avant que le Drukhari ne dépose la larve sur votre visage.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋朝你附近的影子做了个手势，某个人将你的头狠狠地向后扯了过去。玛拉斋将手朝你靠了过来，古怪的物体在他的手上蠕动着。你认出来那是一只幼虫，带着半透明的、充满光泽的皮肤，皮肤下面蓝色的器官不断跳动，小脑袋上还长着锯齿状的下巴。随后，玛拉斋将那只幼虫怼到了你脸上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari gestures to one of the shadows near you and your head is forced backward. Marazhai brings the hand holding the strange object closer: you manage to make out translucent, glossy skin, bluish, pulsating organs beneath, and a little head with serrated jaws, before the Drukhari pushes the larva into your face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋朝你附近的影子做了个手势，那个影子狠狠地扯着你的头。玛拉斋将手朝你靠了过来，古怪的物体在他的手上蠕动着。你认出来那是一只幼虫，带着半透明的、充满光泽的皮肤，皮肤下面蓝色的器官不断跳动，小脑袋上还长着锯齿状的下巴。随后，玛拉斋将那只幼虫怼到了你脸上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}デュカーリがあなたの近くにいる影のひとつに手で合図を送ると、マラズハイがあなたの頭を後方に押しやる。彼は奇妙な物体を持った手を近づけてくる。そしてあなたの顔に押し付けられた時にどうにか判別できたその物体は、半透明の光沢のある皮膚、その下にある青みがかった脈打つ器官、鋸歯状の顎を持つ小さな頭を持つ幼虫だった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari gestures to one of the shadows near you and your head is forced backward. Marazhai brings the hand holding the strange object closer: you manage to make out translucent, glossy skin, bluish, pulsating organs beneath, and a little head with serrated jaws, before the Drukhari pushes the larva into your face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリがあなたの近くにいる影のひとつに手で合図を送ると、マラズハイがあなたの頭を後方に押しやる。彼は奇妙な物体を持った手を近づけてくる。そしてあなたの顔に押し付けられた時にどうにか判別できたその物体は、半透明の光沢のある皮膚、その下にある青みがかった脈打つ器官、鋸歯状の顎を持つ小さな頭を持つ幼虫だった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari gibt einem Schatten neben dir ein Zeichen. Dein Kopf wird gewaltsam nach hinten gezogen. Marazhai hält seine Hand mit dem seltsamen Gegenstand näher an dein Gesicht. Du erkennst durchsichtige, glänzende Haut mit bläulichen, pulsierenden Organen darunter und einen kleinen Kopf mit zackigem Kiefer. Dann drückt dir der Drukhari die Larve ins Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari gestures to one of the shadows near you and your head is forced backward. Marazhai brings the hand holding the strange object closer: you manage to make out translucent, glossy skin, bluish, pulsating organs beneath, and a little head with serrated jaws, before the Drukhari pushes the larva into your face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Drukhari gestikuliert in Richtung eines Schattens neben dir, der daraufhin deinen Kopf gewaltsam nach hinten zieht. Marazhai hält seine Hand mit dem seltsamen Gegenstand näher an dein Gesicht. Du erkennst durchsichtige, glänzende Haut mit bläulichen, pulsierenden Organen darunter und einen kleinen Kopf mit zackigem Kiefer. Dann drückt dir der Drukhari die Larve ins Gesicht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari hace un gesto a una de las sombras que está junto a ti, y alguien tira con fuerza de tu cabeza hacia atrás. Marazhai te acerca la mano que sostiene el extraño objeto: logras discernir una piel traslúcida y lustrosa, los palpitantes órganos azulados que hay debajo y una cabeza minúscula con mandíbulas serradas antes de que el Drukhari presione la larva contra tu rostro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari gestures to one of the shadows near you and your head is forced backward. Marazhai brings the hand holding the strange object closer: you manage to make out translucent, glossy skin, bluish, pulsating organs beneath, and a little head with serrated jaws, before the Drukhari pushes the larva into your face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Drukhari hace un gesto a una de las sombras que está junto a ti, y esta tira con fuerza de tu cabeza hacia atrás. Marazhai te acerca la mano que sostiene el extraño objeto: logras discernir una piel traslúcida y lustrosa, los palpitantes órganos azulados que hay debajo y una cabeza minúscula con mandíbulas serradas antes de que el Drukhari presione la larva contra tu rostro.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drukhari, yakınındaki gölgelerden birine işarette bulunuyor, başın yeniden geriye doğru yatırılıyor. Marazhai, nesneyi tutan elini sana doğru yaklaştırıyor. Yarı saydam, parlak deriyi, altındaki nabız gibi atan mavimsi organları ve dişli bir çeneye sahip küçük başı görebiliyorsun. O anda Drukhari, larvayı yüzüne bırakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari gestures to one of the shadows near you and your head is forced backward. Marazhai brings the hand holding the strange object closer: you manage to make out translucent, glossy skin, bluish, pulsating organs beneath, and a little head with serrated jaws, before the Drukhari pushes the larva into your face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari yakınındaki gölgelerden birine bir işaret yapıyor ve başın yeniden geriye doğru yatırılıyor. Marazhai nesneyi tutan elini sana doğru yaklaştırıyor. Yarı saydam, parlak deriyi, altındaki nabız gibi atan mavimsi organları ve dişli bir çeneye sahip küçük başı görebiliyorsun. Ardından Drukhari larvayı yüzüne bırakıyor.{/n}
